verses.text: Give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add to\add* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*: \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* your \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* to the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 78.1 \ft Maschil…: or, A Psalm for Asaph to give instruction\f*
I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*: I will \w utter|strong="H5042"\w* dark \w sayings|strong="H2420"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*:
Which we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* and \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w told|strong="H5608"\w* us.

We will not \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \add them\add* from their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w shewing|strong="H5608"\w* to the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w come|strong="H0314"\w* the \w praises|strong="H8416"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his \w strength|strong="H5807"\w*, and his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

For he \w established|strong="H6965"\w* a \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* in \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* a \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that they should make them \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*:

That the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w come|strong="H0314"\w* might \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add them, even\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add which\add* should be \w born|strong="H3205"\w*; \add who\add* should \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* and \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \add them\add* to their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*:

That they might \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w hope|strong="H3689"\w* in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \w works|strong="H4611"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, but \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*:

And might not be as their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, a \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w* and \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*; a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \add that\add* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* not their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w aright|strong="H3559"\w*, and whose \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was not \w stedfast|strong="H0539"\w* with \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.\f + \fr 78.8 \ft that…: Heb. that prepared not their heart\f*

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \add being\add* \w armed|strong="H5401"\w*, \add and\add* \w carrying|strong="H7411"\w* \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, turned \w back|strong="H2015"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H7128"\w*.\f + \fr 78.9 \ft carrying: Heb. throwing forth\f*
They \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* not the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w law|strong="H8451"\w*;
And \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* his \w works|strong="H5949"\w*, and his \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* that he had \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them.

Marvellous \w things|strong="H6382"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he in the \w sight|strong="H5048"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add in\add* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w*.

He \w divided|strong="H1234"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and caused them to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*; and he made the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* as an \w heap|strong="H5067"\w*.

In the \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w* also he \w led|strong="H5148"\w* them with a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* with a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

He \w clave|strong="H1234"\w* the \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and gave \add them\add* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* as \add out of\add* the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w depths|strong="H8415"\w*.

He \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w streams|strong="H5140"\w* also out of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and caused \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* to run \w down|strong="H3381"\w* like \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.
And they \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* yet \w more|strong="H3254"\w* against him by \w provoking|strong="H4784"\w* the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H6723"\w*.
And they \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* in their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* by \w asking|strong="H7592"\w* \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* for their \w lust|strong="H5315"\w*.

Yea, they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Can|strong="H3201"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w furnish|strong="H6186"\w* a \w table|strong="H7979"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*?\f + \fr 78.19 \ft furnish: Heb. order\f*

Behold, he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, that the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* gushed \w out|strong="H2100"\w*, and the \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* \w overflowed|strong="H7857"\w*; \w can|strong="H3201"\w* he \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* also? \w can|strong="H3201"\w* he \w provide|strong="H3559"\w* \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* for his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add this\add*, and was \w wroth|strong="H5674"\w*: so a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H5400"\w* against \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* also came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;
Because they \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* not in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* not in his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*:

Though he had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* from \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*,

And had rained \w down|strong="H4305"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* upon them to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them of the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Man|strong="H0376"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w angels’|strong="H0047"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*: he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them \w meat|strong="H6720"\w* to the \w full|strong="H7648"\w*.\f + \fr 78.25 \ft Man…: or, Every one did eat the bread of the mighty\f*

He caused an east \w wind|strong="H6921"\w* to \w blow|strong="H5265"\w* in the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: and by his \w power|strong="H5797"\w* he brought \w in|strong="H5090"\w* the south \w wind|strong="H8486"\w*.\f + \fr 78.26 \ft to blow: Heb. to go\f*

He \w rained|strong="H4305"\w* \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* also upon them as \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and \w feathered|strong="H3671"\w* \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* like as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*:\f + \fr 78.27 \ft feathered…: Heb. fowl of wing\f*
And he let \add it\add* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of their \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* their \w habitations|strong="H4908"\w*.
So they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and were \w well|strong="H3966"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*: for he \w gave|strong="H0935"\w* them their own \w desire|strong="H8378"\w*;
They were not \w estranged|strong="H2114"\w* from their \w lust|strong="H8378"\w*. But while their \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* \add was\add* yet in their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*,

The \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* upon them, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* the \w fattest|strong="H4924"\w* of them, and smote \w down|strong="H3766"\w* the \w chosen|strong="H0970"\w* \add men\add* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 78.31 \ft smote…: Heb. made to bow\f*\f + \fr 78.31 \ft chosen…: or, young men\f*
For all this they \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* still, and \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* not for his wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*.
Therefore their \w days|strong="H3117"\w* did he \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* in \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, and their \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w trouble|strong="H0928"\w*.
When he \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them, then they \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* him: and they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* and enquired \w early|strong="H7836"\w* after \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

And they \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* their \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, and the \w high|strong="H5945"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* their \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*.
Nevertheless they did \w flatter|strong="H6601"\w* him with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and they \w lied|strong="H3576"\w* unto him with their \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w*.
For their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was not \w right|strong="H3559"\w* with him, neither were they \w stedfast|strong="H0539"\w* in his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

But he, \add being\add* full of \w compassion|strong="H7349"\w*, \w forgave|strong="H3722"\w* \add their\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \add them\add* not: yea, many a \w time|strong="H7235"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* he his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, and did not stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* all his \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*.

For he \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* that they \add were but\add* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; a \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* that passeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, and cometh not \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* oft did they \w provoke|strong="H4784"\w* him in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add and\add* \w grieve|strong="H6087"\w* him in the \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*!\f + \fr 78.40 \ft provoke: or, rebel against\f*

Yea, they turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* and \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and \w limited|strong="H8428"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

They \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \add nor\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when he \w delivered|strong="H6299"\w* them from the \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w*.\f + \fr 78.42 \ft from…: or, from affliction\f*

How he had \w wrought|strong="H7760"\w* his \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and his \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w*:\f + \fr 78.43 \ft wrought: Heb. set\f*
And had \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* their \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* into \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; and their \w floods|strong="H5140"\w*, that they could not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* divers sorts of \w flies|strong="H6157"\w* among them, which \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* them; and \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*, which \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* them.
He \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* also their \w increase|strong="H2981"\w* unto the \w caterpiller|strong="H2625"\w*, and their \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* unto the \w locust|strong="H0697"\w*.

He \w destroyed|strong="H2026"\w* their \w vines|strong="H1612"\w* with \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, and their sycomore \w trees|strong="H8256"\w* with \w frost|strong="H2602"\w*.\f + \fr 78.47 \ft destroyed: Heb. killed\f*\f + \fr 78.47 \ft frost: or, great hailstones\f*

He gave \w up|strong="H5462"\w* their \w cattle|strong="H1165"\w* also to the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, and their \w flocks|strong="H4735"\w* to hot \w thunderbolts|strong="H7565"\w*.\f + \fr 78.48 \ft gave…: Heb. shut up\f*\f + \fr 78.48 \ft hot…: or, lightnings\f*

He \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* upon them the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*, and \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*, and \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, by \w sending|strong="H4917"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \add among them\add*.

He \w made|strong="H6424"\w* a \w way|strong="H5410"\w* to his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*; he \w spared|strong="H2820"\w* not their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, but \w gave|strong="H5462"\w* their \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w over|strong="H5462"\w* to the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*;\f + \fr 78.50 \ft He made…: Heb. He weighed a path\f*\f + \fr 78.50 \ft life…: or, beasts to the murrain\f*

And \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; the \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* of \add their\add* \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* in the \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*:

But made his own \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to go \w forth|strong="H5265"\w* like \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w guided|strong="H5090"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* like a \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*.

And he \w led|strong="H5148"\w* them on \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, so that they \w feared|strong="H6342"\w* not: but the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H3680"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 78.53 \ft overwhelmed: Heb. covered\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of his \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \add even to\add* this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \add which\add* his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* had \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w*.

He cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* also \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w divided|strong="H5307"\w* them an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* by \w line|strong="H2256"\w*, and made the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

Yet they \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* and \w provoked|strong="H4784"\w* the most \w high|strong="H5945"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* not his \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*:

But turned \w back|strong="H5472"\w*, and dealt \w unfaithfully|strong="H0898"\w* like their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: they were turned \w aside|strong="H2015"\w* like a \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*.
For they provoked him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and moved him to \w jealousy|strong="H7065"\w* with their graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.
When \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add this\add*, he was \w wroth|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w abhorred|strong="H3988"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

So that he \w forsook|strong="H5203"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \add which\add* he \w placed|strong="H7931"\w* among \w men|strong="H0120"\w*;

And \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* his \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, and his \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* into the \w enemy’s|strong="H6862"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

He \w gave|strong="H5462"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w over|strong="H5462"\w* also unto the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and was \w wroth|strong="H5674"\w* with his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

The \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* their young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*; and their \w maidens|strong="H1330"\w* were not given to \w marriage|strong="H1984"\w*.\f + \fr 78.63 \ft given…: Heb. praised\f*
Their \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and their \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* made no \w lamentation|strong="H1058"\w*.

Then the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w awaked|strong="H3364"\w* as one out of \w sleep|strong="H3463"\w*, \add and\add* like a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* that \w shouteth|strong="H7442"\w* by reason of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* his \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* in the hinder \w parts|strong="H0268"\w*: he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them to a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

Moreover he \w refused|strong="H3988"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* not the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*:
But \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* which he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*.

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* like \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \add palaces\add*, like the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* which he hath \w established|strong="H3245"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 78.69 \ft established: Heb. founded\f*
He \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* also his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him from the \w sheepfolds|strong="H4356"\w*:

From \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the ewes great with \w young|strong="H5763"\w* he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 78.71 \ft following: Heb. after\f*

So he \w fed|strong="H7462"\w* them according to the \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; and \w guided|strong="H5148"\w* them by the \w skilfulness|strong="H8394"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.
